DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare C&P examination reports performed using a Compensation and Pension Examination Program (CPEP) computerized, templated documentation tool to a customary examination performed and then report dictated in quality, completeness, timeliness and veteran satisfaction.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Computerized Template Entry for Compensation and Pension (C&P) Examinations
DOC.criteria: Subjects for the current study included veterans scheduled for C&P examination of two or fewer joints at VA TVHS. No ethnic or racial group or gender was excluded. Veterans were excluded if they were scheduled: 1. for examination of more than two joints, 2. with other requested exam protocols in addition to joints
